actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
rating.rating_id,
to_char(rating.created_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_time,
rating.created_by,
rating.updated_by,
to_char(rating.updated_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as updated_time, 
agent.area_zone as Zone,
rating.remarks, 
rating.agent_id,
agent.agent_name,
rating.ticket_count,
rating.visit_count,
rating.avg_ticket_rating,
rating.avg_visit_rating,
rating.zh_avg_rating as final_rating,
SUBSTR(cast(rating.working_hours as text),0,9) AS Working_Hours
FROM public.agent_rating as rating
join agent on agent.agent_id=rating.agent_id
where 
to_char(rating.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') >=
to_char(date({{from_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')
and 
to_char(rating.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') <=
to_char(date({{to_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')
and agent.agent_email={{appsmith.user.email}}
order by rating.created_time desc
;
